schedules.name: dummy
schedules.summary: Seemingly, `accept_case_reports` has dependency on `registrations`. A form configured for `accept_case_reports` needs to have a corresponding entry in `registrations`. This schedule is never triggered. It is used in the corresponding entries in `registrations` config.
